mapper.sql: org_id, org_code, inner_code, share_flag, org_level, parent_id, status, valid_flag, dept_code, manager_uids, create_time, update_time, issuer_flag

select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from base_org
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into base_org (org_id, org_code, inner_code, share_flag, org_level, parent_id, status, valid_flag, dept_code, manager_uids, create_time, update_time, issuer_flag) values (#{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{innerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orgLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{validFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerUids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{issuerFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
